title: Mystix London | Stress Relief Essential Oil Blend - 10ml - 100% Pure
features: Stress Relief involves removing stresses in a material and in this case - humans. The Stress Relief Blend contains essential oils that are reputed to alleviate symptoms of stress and allow your uplifting and carefree nature to resurface.
Contains: Bergamot (Citrus Bergamia Melarosa), Patchouli (Pogostemon Cablin), Orange (Citrus Sinensis), Ylang Ylang (Cananga Odorata) and Thyme (Thymus Vulgaris).
The bottle comes in a presentation box with instructions leaflet included.
description: Stress Relief involves removing stresses in a material and in this case - humans. The Stress Relief Blend contains essential oils that are reputed to alleviate symptoms of stress and allow your uplifting and carefree nature to resurface.
Contains: Bergamot (Citrus Bergamia Melarosa), Patchouli (Pogostemon Cablin), Orange (Citrus Sinensis), Ylang Ylang (Cananga Odorata) and Thyme (Thymus Vulgaris).
Cautions: It is possible that this oil blend may cause sensitivities; we do not recommend these blends as a replacement for traditional medicine.

Never use pure oils on the skin without diluting, never use internally, keep away from children and eyes, always check if there are any medical issues which could cause a problem. Seek help if you have any doubts.
Important Note: The information provided is for educational purposes only.
